## Corse Description
## Conditionals and Control Flow
### Equality
```{r}
3 == (2+1)
"intermediate" != "r"
TRUE != FALSE
"Rchitect" != "rchitect"
# All these expressiones are true!

# Other Instructions
TRUE == FALSE
-6*14 != 17-101
"useR" == "user"
TRUE == 1

```

#### Greater and less than

```{r}
(1+2) > 4
"dogs"< "Cats"
TRUE <= FALSE

# comparison of numerics
-6*5+2 >= -10+1
# comparison caracters
"raining" <= "raining dogs"
TRUE > FALSE
```

### Compare vectors

```{r}
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
facebook <- c(17,7,5,16,8,13,14)

linkedin > 15
linkedin <= 5
```

### compare matrices
```{r}
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
facebook <- c(17,7,5,16,8,13,14)

views <- matrix(c(linkedin,facebook), nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE)
views

# when does views = 13

views == 13
views <= 14
```

## Logical Operators
### & and |

```{r}
TRUE & TRUE
FALSE | TRUE
5 <= 5 & 7 <6 
3 < 4 | 7 < 6

# EXAMPLE
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
last <- tail(linkedin,1)
```
